name: ASCPEM-PRF-12 - Storable and Member Data Element Excessive Number of Aggregated Storable and Member Data Elements
description:
Objective
Detection of occurrences of this pattern helps reducing response time to end-users by preventing the creation of too large data elements.

Consequence
Software featuring known under-efficient coding practices requires excessive computational resources

qualityRules.name: Quality Rules in numeric ID order

qualityTemplates.name: Quality Templates in numeric ID order
